name: Love & Destroy
overview: "LOVE & DESTROY" is developed by Inti Creates, released by Sony Computer Entertainment on December 16, 1999 romance action game for PlayStation. Masakazu Katsura for character design. The catchphrase says, "Can you save" Q-TRON "and" now "! Manipulating the 3D robot and clearing the action scene with the high score increases the likelihood of the main female character. Animation is inserted in key places
